description.ko: 메마른 찰흙, 고대의 암석, 선명한 광물 줄기 사이의 대비를 포착하여 우리 행성의 가공되지 않은 복잡한 표면을 깊이 있게 탐구합니다.
description.en: A deep dive into the raw and intricate surfaces of our planet, capturing the contrast between parched clay, ancient stone, and vibrant mineral veins.

prompt: Macro photography of diverse Earth textures, TERRA-1 style, high-detail cracked desert soil, moss-covered volcanic basalt, layered sedimentary rock formations, crystalline mineral deposits, cinematic natural lighting, earthy ochre and deep slate color palette, 8k resolution, hyper-realistic, intricate geological patterns.
